SEARCH
Package gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming

Class MonitorAPI

java.lang.Object
gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming.SuperAPI
gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming.MonitorAPI
public class MonitorAPI extends SuperAPI
Class: MonitorAPI is a class that contains methods that retrieves information about the containers, it monitors the docker system. It is a subclass of SuperAPI.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getContainerModels

      public List<ContainerModel> getContainerModels()
      Retrieves the list of ContainerModels. This method is annotated with @VisibleForTesting to indicate that its visibility has been expanded for testing purposes, allowing tests to access the containerModels directly.
      Returns:
      List of ContainerModels containing information about locally installed containers.

    • initializeContainerModels

      public void initializeContainerModels(boolean showAll)
      Method: initializeContainerModels(boolean showAll) initializes container models based on the locally installed containers. It retrieves a list of containers, considering the 'showAll' parameter and creates corresponding ContainerModel instances.
      Parameters:
      showAll - Indicates whether to include stopped containers (true) or only running ones (false).

    • getContainerList

      public void getContainerList()
      Method: getContainerList() prints the names of the locally installed containers, their ids, their status and the time they were created.

    • getContainerPorts

      public void getContainerPorts()
      Method: getContainerPorts() prints the information about the ports of the containers.

    • getContainerCommands

      public void getContainerCommands()
      Method: getContainerCommands() prints the command that was used to create the container.

    • getContainerStatus

      public void getContainerStatus()
      Method: getContainerStatus() prints the status of the container as described in ContainerModel.java.

    • convertUnixToRealTime

      public void convertUnixToRealTime()
      Method: convertUnixToRealTime() retrieves and prints the creation date of each container. This method iterates the list of container models and prints the creation date of each container. unixTimestamp is expressed in seconds since the Unix epoch (January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC). An alternative that might result in an exception. import java.util.Date; import java.text.SimpleDateFormat ; . . . var containerInfo = ContainerManager.dc.inspectContainerCmd(c.getContainerId()).exec(); var createdTimestamp = Integer.parseInt(containerInfo.getCreated()); Date createdDate = new Date(createdTimestamp * 1000); SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd"); String formattedDate = dateFormat.format(createdDate); System.out.println("Container created date (Docker Java API): " + formattedDate);

    • getContainerInfo

      public String[][] getContainerInfo()
      Retrieves information about containers, including their IDs, names, image IDs and creation timestamps. Converts Unix timestamps to human-readable date-time format.
      Returns:
      A 2D array containing container information, where each row represents a container and columns contain ID, formatted names, image ID, and creation timestamp.

    • getNameList

      public ArrayList<String> getNameList()
      Retrieves a list of formatted container names from the ContainerModels.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Strings representing the formatted container names.

    • getIdList

      public ArrayList<String> getIdList()
      Retrieves a list of container IDs from the ContainerModels.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Strings representing the container IDs.

    • getStatusList

      public ArrayList<String> getStatusList()
      Retrieves a list of container statuses from the ContainerModels.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Strings representing the container statuses.

    • getTimeCreatedList

      public ArrayList<String> getTimeCreatedList()
      Retrieves a list of formatted creation timestamps for each container in ContainerModels.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Strings representing the formatted creation timestamps.

    • getImageIdList

      public ArrayList<String> getImageIdList()
      Retrieves a list of image IDs associated with the containers from the ContainerModels.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Strings representing the image IDs.

    • getImageNameList

      public ArrayList<String> getImageNameList()
      Retrieves a list of image names associated with the containers from the ContainerModels.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Strings representing the image names.
